channel.title: [req]assassin cape emote[req]
channel.description:
I am requesting a custom made emote for a new skill I have made. Here's what I need to happen if anyone's interested...
Jump into the air, spin, throw daggers or knifes of some sort and land.
Thanks if anyone can manage to do this...xD[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 16, 2009, 05:09:45 pm[/size][hr]Guessing no one is going to attempt this...

item.title: [req]assassin cape emote[req]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

[code][quote=“Setsuna, post:7, topic:278651”][quote author=Mr Mopar link=topic=367819.msg2787826#msg2787826 date=1242582754]

I mean like, a completely custom emote. Would need new models and such.

someone did have the skillcape emote models but i cant find the post
[/quote]

Don’t need the old emotes, I want somebody to make me an emote like explained above, new GFX and everything.[/quote]
i know i tried my best to help…like i said [code // cape emote
case ###

				c.setAnimation(2588; //jump
                                    c.setAnimation(##; //spin in air
                                    c.setAnimation(or gfx)(####; //throwing(idk if thats possible
                                    c.height+1(dunno what to put :P)

break; [/code]
try to look for certain gfx’s or emotes,set height level when doing so.

Read full topic

item.title: [req]assassin cape emote[req]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

[quote=“Setsuna, post:1, topic:278651”]throw daggers or knifes of some sort
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 16, 2009, 05:09:45 pm[/size][hr][/quote]
not possible i think…wait…hmm…could use gfx…

2588 for jumping emote(make height level+1)
cant find the spin emote but also make it height+1 while doing the other one

so in clicking most you would put something [size=20pt]LIKE[/size] this

// cape emote
case ###

					c.setAnimation(2588; //jump
                                        c.setAnimation(##; //spin in air
                                        c.setAnimation(or gfx)(####; //throwing(idk if thats possible
                                        c.height+1(dunno what to put :P)
break;

idk lol trying to find something off the top of my head >.>

Read full topic
